Bayern Munich have decided Chelsea transfer target Thiago Alcântara can leave the club in the summer if an offer of £75 million arrives for his services.

That's according to German magazine Kicker (via The Sun's Toby Gannon), which reported the Blues value the Espanyol closer to £75 million but could change their mind because of their midfield needs.

Thiago has only started six Bundesliga matches this season, as the Bavarians have preferred other options. He made a short cameo in the recent Klassiker against Borussia Dortmund, while James Rodriguez and Javi Martinez started.

Rodriguez is starting to find his feet in Germany in a less advanced role, and that's bad news for Thiago.


The 26-year-old worked with Chelsea players Pedro and Cesc Fàbregas at Barcelona, with whom he played the worse football of his career. He was mostly used as a substitute for Iniesta and Xavi .

The Spain international has always been effective in the attacking third, as you can see in this video:

https://youtu.be/95L1SG2otlA



His wonderful skill and defensive chops are what set him apart, however, and they would be welcome additions at Stamford Bridge. Depth in midfield has already been a serious problem for the Blues, who have been hit hard by injuries in that area this term.

Cesc Fabregas hasn't been effective playing alongside N'Golo Kante, who has already missed time. Danny Drinkwater has barely seen the pitch since joining in August and isn't rated nearly as highly as Thiago .

Rodriguez is starting to find his feet in Germany in a less advanced role, and that's bad news for Thiago.


The 26-year-old worked with Chelsea players Pedro and Cesc Fàbregas at Barcelona, with whom he played the worse football of his career. He was mostly used as a substitute for Iniesta and Xavi .

The Spain international has always been effective in the attacking third, as you can see in this video:

https://youtu.be/95L1SG2otlA



His wonderful skill and defensive chops are what set him apart, however, and they would be welcome additions at Stamford Bridge. Depth in midfield has already been a serious problem for the Blues, who have been hit hard by injuries in that area this term.

Cesc Fabregas hasn't been effective playing alongside N'Golo Kante, who has already missed time. Danny Drinkwater has barely seen the pitch since joining in August and isn't rated nearly as highly as Thiago .

　　該媒體指出，車路士給夏薩特開出了1760萬歐元的年薪（週薪34萬歐元，年薪接近1800萬歐元），讓他與普巴並列成為英超賽場年薪最高的球員。但是夏薩特不為所動，他依然在等到皇馬的報價。現年26歲的夏薩特跟車路士的合約，將在2020年到期。
　　此前，夏薩特接受媒體採訪時，盛讚施丹：「每個人都知道，我十分尊敬施丹，無論他身為球員還是教練，他是我的偶像。我不知道未來會發生什麼事情，但是如果能夠為施丹效力，這無疑是個夢。」

玩開SM都有一段日子,經常都會去吓D自稱有SM服務供應嘅囡囡,但係好多時都係失望而回,由其係有D祖母級嘅過氣囡囡(嬸嬸),真係開門貼錢都唔會入閘,有D又閃閃縮縮估估吓,大大方方睇得又玩得一手SM嘅Yoyo,可以話係我嘅必然之選.
由於同Yoyo都玩咗一段時間,但係每次總有D驚喜嘅服務比到我,真係令人心服口服,由於今次要自拍VIDEO錄影,唯有黑布蒙頭,但係我諗我當時個樣肯肯定七情上面,面容摟曲都似.本來預約時Yoyo問我有無性趣玩腳交,哈哈哈,腳交?又有幾特別呀?Yoyo話包我有意外驚喜,好!又睇吓點腳交法.
準時到達Yoyo工作室,照舊洗白白,抹完身瞓上大床,帶埋手扣,再黑布蒙頭,Yoyo替我穿上黑絲,吊起雙腳,Yoyo話我細佬唔夠反應,揸住我春袋係咁遙,細佬即時快高長大,開始硬硬地,佢再同我打幾吓機,真係爽!突然菊花一涼,Yoyo應該倒咗KY落去,即時心跳起來,噢!佢用腳趾將一粒震蛋塞入去,攪到我high晒,忍忍忍,細佬突然比馬鞭拍打著,Yoyo再用粗言刺激我,佢再將D腳趾撩動著,由於四肢受綁,感覺極度被虐嘅感覺,真係前所未有,只能夠話好high好high,腦內一片空白,Yoyo抽回震蛋,再換咗隻膠襪,將幾隻腳趾插晒入去,再一路抽插和拍打我春袋,忍到我幾乎叫救命,最後關頭終於射精射到上心口,咁樣玩另類腳交,真係爽到無輪!
